original_text: In those days, when again a great crowd had gathered, and they had nothing to eat, he called his disciples to him and said to them,
korean_text: 그 무렵에 또 큰 무리가 있어 먹을 것이 없는지라 예수께서 제자들을 불러 이르시되

sentences.original_text: when again a great crowd had gathered,
and they had nothing to eat,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게는 먹을 것이 없었을 때,

sentences.original_text: he called his disciples to him
